text: matavitay parriyum um'mitam vinavukirarkal;. Nir kurum; "atu (or upataiyana) tittu akum;. Akave matavitayin potu penkalai vittum vilakiyirunkal. Avarkal tuymaiyakum varai avarkalai anukatirkal;. Avarkal tuymaiyatainta pin allah eppati kattalaiyittirukkinrano atanpati avarkalitam cellunkal;. Pavankalaivittu milpavarkalai niccayamaka allah necikkiran;. Innum tuymaiyaka irupporaiyum necikkinran
